overview:
With over 20 years of marketing and strategic experience Jim has become a leading architect of innovative strategies for branded products with a focus on efficiency and credibility as the keys to consumer relevance and ROI. Spinello focused his professional career on understanding the power of non-traditional approaches to brand building and the efficacy and sustainability of these strategies in reaching consumers.

At Birdsong Ventures, Jim focuses on seed stage investments and mentoring. Working as either an agency partner, investor, mentor or entrepreneur Jim has worked to facilitate the handshake between brands, consumers, founders and financiers with efficiency, technology, mentorship and style.

Jim sits on the boards of several Chicago based startups, and has built agencies and consumer product companies. Over the years Jim has produced more than 500 pieces of digital and televised episodic content and built integrated, multi-media consumer engagements for clients including: NFL, ESPN X Games, Red Bull, Dyson and Chipotle. Additionally, he founded a globally, branded snowboard and accessory company with offices in the US, Europe and Japan.
